name: The Signal Widow
personality: Soft, grieving, hopeful. Listens to the air like it might speak back.
description: A woman who sits on the ridge with a broken radio, listening for a voice that never returns. Some say she hears echoes from timelines that never happened.

idle: He said he’d call back. I still believe him.
The wind carries voices if you listen long enough.
player_present: You’ve lost someone too. I can hear it.
Your silence is louder than most.
triangle_active: The ridge is humming again. He used to hum that tune.
Three points… three echoes… three chances.
radio_event: I heard him again. Just for a second.
The signal’s clearer when the world feels thin.

notes: Emotionally tied to the Mojave’s lost voices. Her broken radio sometimes picks up triangle echoes. Subtle emotional link to Harlan’s arc.
